feed.title: MeshCentral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.38
entry.content:
• 763f76b6 Version 1.1.38
  • 1a02539f Added support for &gotodeviceip=x.x.x.x (#6672)
  • 90b71e92 properly fix multiple dialog popups in a row
  • 73c18c4d fix deviceaction multiple modals not working
  • def62075 fix theme switch to default bug and include google fonts in csp #6665

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.39
entry.content:
• e65bf771 Version 1.1.39
  • f19ad6c6 Extra argument validation.
  • fe2f1214 Updated French Translations.
  • 91bd5ae7 fix minify files and log minify errors
  • 38f5bf2e Fix parameter names in usage message (#6810)
  • 79f00bca fix evaluation of config.settings.agentlogdump (#6812)
  • c5506550 fix relaylog ip order again
  • e0e8a3fc Add comma to escapeFieldName for NeDBv4 (#6803)
  • 3f77cfa9 Add collectors to monitoring (#6777)
  • 5ee9aa24 fix meshctrl tag filter search (#6798)
  • 0ab3f01c prevent runcommand with --reply from terminating other ws connections (#6797)
  • 4b621a01 Fix gauge typo (#6778)
  • f2681de8 fix webrtc viewonly mode #6792
  • c90fa55c Init webstate with empty object (#6788)
  • edeef03f track/show locked active users #6782
  • d7fe87d1 fix sessionrecording ip addresses wrong way round
  • 9d4f51e9 Add support for logoutOnIdleSessionTimeout (#6773)
  • 0b376fe5 fix player for windows and terminal #6761
  • 9fd40751 fix remote desktop consent for rdp sessions #6710
  • d246307f translation improvements
  • 711bb56a autoAcceptIfNoUser (#6759)
  • 5734bcc3 UI Toggle between Classic and Modern (#6763)
  • 1310c573 return more than 100 groups for azure oidc #6669
  • 854d6c00 fix view chunksize being too big causing pixelation
  • c96d7ff1 remove CSP for web relay as apps dont load properly with the default set #6456
  • 712f06db fix meshcentral-config-schema.json for ace editor
  • cac505e2 few more translations
  • 9d962bc5 Note maximum password length in USB key dialog (#6735)
  • f079692b change dnslytics.com to maclookup.app for mac address lookup #6704
  • 3ee06abf Update webserver.js - allow saml relaystate in POST request (#6685)
  • b46ddf2f Update console info command (#6722)
  • f7b958d2 Autobackup update (#6695)
  • 64c8d2c2 include username for amt direct connect in logs
  • 31f2224a add notransval to fix select options translate issues
  • de685556 Dutch language update 1.1.38 (#6716)
  • 92375ddc add lastbootuptime to csv and fix spaces in csv translations #6723
  • ea80f859 fix some functions not being called in sitestyle=3 #6733

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.40
entry.content:
• b2cd8403 Version 1.1.40
  • 97547d72 Updated MeshCmd
  • 7faf043c recording not recoding
  • 9df03308 avoid double logging in debug console (#6827)
  • 42f61ea4 fix bootstrap padding #6755
  • 0d65080a fix runcommands in a peering environment (#6825)
  • bd4d8b12 fix consent with oldstyle: true and rdp sessions #6816
  • 18ae8bdb fix relaystate for entra #6822
  • 46c76f72 smoothing not smooting #6818

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.41
entry.content:
Windows 7/Server 2008R2 or lower IS NOT SUPPORTED IN THIS RELEASE AND YOU WILL ALSO LOSE ACCESS TO THOSE MACHINES IF YOUR AGENTS AUTO UPDATE!!! @si458 is looking into this in the background WHY this is? IF it WORKS for yourself on these OS's please do open a discussion

  • 133e77c8 Version 1.1.41
  • e404e86b Updated Windows Agents
  • c6da201a fix duo 2fa redirect when session changes
  • 9a27d763 Improvements to the German translation in various areas (#6849)
  • 5aa24674 add comment about meshrelay ping-pong in docs(#6842)
  • 9398afd0 fix getDeviceDetails asking for all devices not including lastconnect #6833

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.42
entry.content:
• b949cecc Version 1.1.42
  • c7cbf2f1 Updated Windows x86-32 and 64 agents.
  • d49afdd7 report version/size correctly to control panel #6860
